statements: SELECT * FROM Patient_Outcomes WHERE Age > 50
SELECT Patient_Name, Diagnosis FROM Patient_Outcomes WHERE Treatment = 'Surgery'
SELECT Patient_ID, Age, Outcome FROM Patient_Outcomes WHERE Diagnosis LIKE '%diabetes%'
SELECT * FROM Patient_Outcomes WHERE Diagnosis = 'Stroke' ORDER BY Age DESC
SELECT DISTINCT Treatment FROM Patient_Outcomes
SELECT Patient_Name, Age, Diagnosis FROM Patient_Outcomes WHERE Age > 50 ORDER BY Patient_Name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patient_Outcomes WHERE Diagnosis LIKE '%Cancer%' AND Treatment = 'Chemotherapy' ORDER BY Patient_ID DESC;
SELECT Patient_ID, Patient_Name, Outcome FROM Patient_Outcomes WHERE Age BETWEEN 18 AND 40 ORDER BY Outcome ASC, Patient_Name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT Diagnosis FROM Patient_Outcomes WHERE Patient_Name LIKE 'J%' OR Patient_Name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY Diagnosis ASC;
SELECT Patient_ID, Patient_Name, Age, Outcome FROM Patient_Outcomes WHERE Age < 30 AND (Diagnosis LIKE '%Flu%' OR Diagnosis LIKE '%Cold%') ORDER BY Age DESC, Patient_ID ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patients ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_age FROM patients WHERE patient_gender='Male';
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_type='Heart Rate' AND metric_value > 80;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_diagnosis FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC, patient_age DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender, patient_diagnosis FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT p.patient_name, m.metric_type, m.metric_value FROM patients p JOIN performance_metrics m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id WHERE m.observation_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT diagnosis, record_date FROM MedicalRecords ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT gender FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, value FROM Patients JOIN PerformanceMetrics ON Patients.patient_id = PerformanceMetrics.patient_id WHERE value > 100;
SELECT * FROM Patients
SELECT patient_name, age FROM Patients
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, gender FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT record_id, diagnosis, treatment FROM MedicalRecords WHERE patient_id = 1
SELECT metric_name, value, metric_date FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE patient_id = 2
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, admission_date, discharge_date FROM Patients WHERE admission_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT specialization, doctor_name FROM Doctors ORDER BY specialization ASC;
SELECT hospital_name, location FROM Hospitals WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT treatment_name, cost FROM Treatments WHERE cost > 1000 ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, admission_date FROM Patients WHERE discharge_date IS NULL;
SELECT hospital_name, location FROM Hospitals ORDER BY hospital_name DESC;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization, hospital_name FROM Doctors INNER JOIN Hospitals ON Doctors.hospital_id = Hospitals.hospital_id;

SELECT t.treatment_name, t.cost, p.patient_name, d.doctor_name FROM Treatments AS t INNER JOIN Patients AS p ON t.patient_id = p.patient_id INNER JOIN Doctors AS d ON t.doctor_id = d.doctor_id WHERE t.cost > 500;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT physician_name, contact_number FROM physicians WHERE specialization = 'Cardiology';
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis, admission_date FROM patients WHERE patient_age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name ASC
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients JOIN patient_records ON patients.patient_id = patient_records.patient_id WHERE record_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT physician_name, specialization FROM physicians WHERE contact_number LIKE '%123%'
SELECT patient_name, physician_name, diagnosis FROM patients JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id JOIN physicians ON appointments.physician_id = physicians.physician_id
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_type = 'appointment' AND metric_value > 90 ORDER BY patient_id ASC, physician_id DESC
